rules.name: AmendedMSCustomerTypeRefreshDecisionTrue

fields.name: ErrorMessageMultiSiteAmendment
fields.fieldText: No Quotes meet criteria for generating Legal Document. Please review quotes to ensure they are in approved status and properly linked. For further assistance, please reach out to your Sales Operations contact.

fields.fieldText: One or more of the following required fields are missing; New Aloha Key Number, Existing Aloha Key Number, Existing Hosted Enterprise ID. Please populate the required fields prior to generating documents.
